channel.title: Voter Satisfaction on How Can Political Parties Satisfy their Voters?
channel.description: Recent content in Voter Satisfaction on How Can Political Parties Satisfy their Voters?

item.title: How Can Political Parties Satisfy their Voters?
item.description: Author(s) Timothy Jordan Regis library(tidyverse) library(visdat) library(skimr) library(cesR) library(labelled) library(ggplot2) Abstract This paper analyzes the most important issues to voters of the; Liberal, Conservative, and NDP political parties in Canada with the intention of guiding politicians toward enacting better policies geared for voter satisfaction. From our study we found that Liberal voters could gain the most satisfaction from increased funding in the education and health care sectors, Conservative voters can benefit the most from solid increases in funding to the health care sector, and NDP voters can gain high amounts of satisfaction with increased funding in any or all of the chosen sectors, with health care appearing most prominent.
